original_title: 世界名作劇場・完結版 愛の若草物語
overview: Meg, faithful and gentle, Jo, independent and energetic, Beth, quiet and shy, Amy, amiable and precocious - the four sisters live vigorously and happily at home with their gentle mother while waiting for their father to return from the Civil War. Helping each other, they challenge their fates and grow up to become wonderful women.
title: World Masterpiece Theater Complete Edition: Little Women
